meanings.definition: Having no ego or sense of self.
meanings.sent1: She approached the task with an egoless attitude, focusing solely on the team's success.
meanings.sent2: The meditation practice aimed to help individuals become more egoless and present in the moment.
meanings.sent3: It was refreshing to meet someone so egoless in a world full of self-centeredness.
meanings.sent4: Her egoless nature allowed her to see situations from different perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The artist's egoless approach to creating art led to truly authentic and unique pieces.

meanings.sent1: He was known for his egoless behavior, always putting others' needs before his own.
meanings.sent2: The team appreciated her egoless leadership style that focused on collaboration and inclusivity.
meanings.sent3: In a world full of ego, his egoless demeanor stood out as a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent4: Her egoless actions spoke louder than any self-centered words ever could.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's egoless approach to education created a supportive and nurturing environment for students.
